titles.title: To authorize 2 additional district judgeships for the district of Colorado.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet.

committee.subcommittee: Courts, Intellectual Property, and the Internet
committee.name: House Judiciary

bill.summary: 6/25/2015--Introduced. Requires the President to appoint, with the advice and consent of the Senate, two additional district judges for the district of Colorado.
